knimeNode.name: Generic Run-for-time Loop Start
knimeNode.shortDescription: Loop start node to repeatedly process entire input table until a specified time period has elapsed.

intro.p: Loop start node to repeatedly process entire input table until a specified time period has elapsed. The user can specify the time period (dd:hh:mm:ss) after which the last iteration will start before. The loop will execute until that time period has elapsed. If connected to a Run-to-time Loop end, the unprocessed rows table will be empty for this node as all rows are processed repeatedly on each loop iteration.

This node was developed by Vernalis Research . For feedback and more information, please contact
knime@vernalis.com

fullDescription.option: The time period after which execution will finish (dd:hh:mm:ss)
Allows the user to manually set the value at which the iteration counter will start (does not affect the processing of the table!)
